name: Existentia
description: Existentia - post-apocalyptic adventure puzzle game with a dark existential atmosphere. As one of the few survivors after the nuclear disaster, you will explore ruins of the post-Soviet republic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Existentia is a game that I recommend because: - it is a method to banish boredom - it has an acceptable price - it is indie - it has adventure - it is a post-apocalyptic game - it has trading cards  Enjoy!

I mean it's not even worth 5 bucks. Maybe 15 minutes of gameplay, if you can even call it that. Broken in-game features. In a game where you're supposed to explore, there sure are a lot of invisible walls.

Don't waste your time on this. Just watch the youtube walkthrough. Get stuck in invisible walls. First run got stuck in first room as could not open the door despite having everything. Found it difficult to care anything about the story or the character. Very short.
